page.title: 03CONEYGREEN COTTAGE,Stourport
page.content: ConeyGreen Cottage was formerly part of Areley Hall estate. The present owners have lived in the cottage for 31 years. They also own ConeyGreen Farm. They have got 1 tractor which is used for cutting grass. They have some livestock:They have geese,hens and a dog. They are situated near Gladderbrook and Areley Wood. They have 7 rooms in the cottage. They own 3.7 acres which originally belonged to ConeyGreen Farm. They are a certified caravan site,but they are only allowed to have up to 5 caravans on the site at one time. They think that there was a brickmaker in the area because Brickyard Cottages are nearby.
